QuestData.Title: Those Blasted Troggs!
QuestData.Description: Those Light-blasted troggs, turning my work site into a wreck! Look at that, there goes another barrel of powder!$b$bOhhh, I wish I could go down there and wring every one of their scrawny little necks! I want to kill them all!$b$bThis can't be good for my health, all this stress and anger... What have they left me with? Nothing!$b$bI'd kill them myself, but my aim's no good anymore! You go into the quarry and kill some of the filthy buggers! I'll pay you! Just hurt them, kill them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Rockjaw Skullthumpers and 8 Rockjaw Bonesnappers in the Gol'Bolar Quarry and its mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: It makes me so mad! Grrr...
QuestData.RewardText: Well, that makes me feel a little better...$b$bBut I won't be happy until they're all dead! All of them!
